Aris Li, Chief Financial Officer and Co-founder of Leweskool Consulting, spent most of his time in civil service and various voluntary organisations in Hong Kong. He has in-depth knowledge of immigration laws and government regulations. His specialties are in finance, investment management and economics. 講緊個 network
歐洲唔興玩 credit card, 所以好多銀行都會出 debit. Debit 就得 Visa Debit 同 MasterCard/Maestro.
Visa Debit 同 MasterCard 英國就用得多, Maestro 就歐洲大陸多.
通常俾錢/禁錢都係用 MasterCard/Maestro network.

visa 就全世界都通行, 但係 mastercard/maestro 就歐洲多啲人用
點解樓上話美國 -> visa, 係因爲 visa payment network 早出過 MasterCard, 所以多啲人用, 多啲銀行adapt

again 兩個network 其實無乜分別

replies.msg:
HSBC Plus ATM card第一帳戶為Current Account,
第二帳戶才是saving account(在海外提款赤必能show出來）
不如直接申請HSBC UK Bank Account (即Current Account) with VISA debit card.
Or HSBC US Checking Account with VISA debit card. HSBC USA仲可申請埋Credit Card,
或AMEX Credit Cards國際轉卡一樣，建立自己在美國的信用紀錄。

香港渣打也有發行Maestro and Cirrus ATM debit card, 不過好少人使用中。

Citi HK MasterCard ATM Debit card當然係比較好用，同埋Citi HK Credit Cards不能link bank accounts, 所以ATM提款一定要用Citi HK MasterCard ATM debit card.

quote.msg: HSBC 行plus
Plus要另外申請，同埋只可以link支票戶

HSBC Plus ATM card第一帳戶為Current Account,
第二帳戶才是saving account(在海外提款赤必能show出來）
不如直接申請HSBC UK Bank Account (即Current Account) with VISA debit card.
Or HSBC US Checking Account with VISA debit card. HSBC USA仲可申請埋Credit Card,
或AMEX Credit Cards國際轉卡一樣，建立自己在美國的信用紀錄。

香港渣打也有發行Maestro and Cirrus ATM debit card, 不過好少人使用中。

Citi HK MasterCard ATM Debit card當然係比較好用，同埋Citi HK Credit Cards不能link bank accounts, 所以ATM提款一定要用Citi HK MasterCard ATM debit card.
即係同Citi debit 個global wallet 一樣
